item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, June 26, 2024 at 12:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. [Opinion] Britain’s big election will be the one after this
2. Julian Assange lands in Australia after walking free from US court
3. UK election betting scandal deepens as Labour suspends candidate
4. What happens if Biden or Trump drops out of the presidential race?
5. Democratic ‘Squad’ member loses New York primary on split over Gaza war
item.guid: FT Most Read: Wednesday, June 26, 2024 at 12:25 PM UTC
